title: PM grieved over demise of Sardar Sikandar Hayat
content:
In a message of condolence on Twitter, he said, “Saddened to learn of the passing of Sardar Sikandar Hayat Khan, former President of AJK as well as former PM of AJK. His contribution to the Kashmir cause & service to the Kashmiri people were invaluable. My prayers & condolences go to his family.”
